title: The Second Life Cheat Reincarnation Mage ~When The Strongest Reincarnated After 1,000 Years, His Life Was Too Much For Him~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Cunning Protagonist   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Dungeons   Evil Gods   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Genius Protagonist   Godly Powers   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Narcissistic Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Polygamy   Reincarnation   Ruthless Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Tsundere
author: Utsuzawa Shikiso   鬱沢色素
description:
A mage who has become too strong, bored with his first life, reincarnates 1000 years later.

But when he reincarnates as Kurt, he sees a world where magical civilization has declined and mage who are much weaker than they were 1000 years ago.

There, Kurt is mistakenly perceived to be 'defective magic', but only he knows this.

“Defective magic? What are you talking about? Isn’t that the strongest and best golden color?”

Eventually, the strongest mage attends a magic school and fights back in his second life!>
